description.english: Unlock your first crewmember.
description.german: Schalte dein erstes Crewmitglied frei.
description.french: Débloquez le premier membre de votre équipe.
description.italian: Sblocca la tua prima compagna di squadra.
description.spanish: Desbloquea a tu primer miembro de equipo.
description.dutch: Voeg het eerste lid aan je crew toe.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o primeiro membro da sua equipe.

displayName.english: A Horse With A Mighty Roar
displayName.french: Un cheval au rugissement de lion
displayName.spanish: Un caballo con un poderoso rugido
displayName.dutch: Een Paard Met Een Krachtige Brul

description.english: Upgrade your engine.
description.german: Rüste deinen Motor auf.
description.french: Améliorez votre moteur.
description.italian: Potenzia il tuo motore.
description.spanish: Optimiza tu motor.
description.dutch: Koop een nieuwe motor.
description.brazilian: Dê um upgrade no motor.

description.english: Respray your entire car using paint all.
description.german: Lackiere mit Alles Lackieren dein gesamtes Auto neu.
description.french: Repeignez l'intégralité de votre voiture.
description.italian: Rivernicia tutta l'auto usando Vernicia Tutto.
description.spanish: Vuelve a pintar tu vehículo por completo usando toda la pintura.
description.dutch: Verf je auto met de 'verf alles' functie.
description.brazilian: Pintou seu carro todo.

description.english: Purchase your first interior part.
description.german: Kaufe dein erstes Teil für die Innenausstattung.
description.french: Achetez votre première pièce d'habitacle.
description.italian: Acquista il tuo primo ricambio da interni.
description.spanish: Compra tu primera pieza interior.
description.russian: Впервые приобрести деталь для внутренней отделки авто
description.dutch: Koop je eerste onderdeel voor het interieur van je auto.
description.brazilian: Compre sua primeira peça de interior.

description.english: Purchase your first performance part.
description.german: Kaufe dein erstes Leistung verbesserndes Teil.
description.french: Achetez votre première pièce de performance.
description.italian: Acquista il tuo primo ricambio da prestazioni.
description.spanish: Compra tu primera pieza de funcionamiento.
description.russian: Впервые приобрести деталь для производительности авто
description.polish: Kup pierwszą część związaną z osiągami.
description.dutch: Koop je eerste onderdeel voor de prestatie van je auto.
description.brazilian: Compre sua primeira peça de desempenho.

displayName.english: The Best A Car Can Get
displayName.german: Das Beste, was ein Auto bekommen kann
displayName.spanish: Lo mejor que un vehículo puede obtener
displayName.dutch: Het Beste Dat Een Auto Kan Zijn

description.english: Purchase your first exterior part.
description.german: Kaufe dein erstes Karosserieteil.
description.french: Achetez votre première pièce extérieure.
description.italian: Acquista il tuo primo ricambio da carrozzeria.
description.spanish: Compra tu primera pieza exterior.
description.russian: Впервые приобрести деталь для внешнего вида авто
description.dutch: Koop je eerste onderdeel voor het uiterlijk van je auto.
description.brazilian: Compre sua primeira peça de exterior.

displayName.french: Vous n'auriez pas du ruban adhésif ?

description.english: Wreck your car 25 times.
description.german: Zerstöre dein Auto 25 Mal.
description.french: Détruisez votre voiture 25 fois.
description.italian: Distruggi la tua auto 25 volte.
description.spanish: Destroza tu vehículo 25 veces.
description.dutch: Crash je auto 25 keer.
description.brazilian: Acabe com o carro 25 vezes.

description.english: Spend 5 minutes in the air.
description.german: Verbringe 5 Minuten in der Luft.
description.french: Passez 5 minutes dans les airs.
description.italian: Trascorri 5 minuti per aria.
description.spanish: Pasa 5 minutos en el aire.
description.dutch: Besteed 5 minuten in de lucht.
description.brazilian: Passe 5 minutos no ar.

description.english: Eliminate 25 opponents.
description.german: Eliminiere 25 Gegner.
description.french: Éliminez 25 adversaires.
description.italian: Elimina 25 avversari.
description.spanish: Elimina a 25 oponentes.
description.dutch: Elimineer 25 tegenstanders.
description.brazilian: Derrote 25 adversários.

description.english: Drift for 10 miles (16,1 km) total.
description.german: Drifte insgesamt 16,1 km (10 Meilen).
description.french: Driftez sur 16,1 km (10 miles).
description.italian: Guida in drifting per 16,1km (10 miglia)
description.spanish: Te desviaste 161,1 km (10 millas) en total.
description.dutch: Drift voor 16.1 km (10 mijl) totaal.
description.brazilian: Faça um total de 16,10 Km (10 milhas) de drift.

description.english: Drive for 500 miles (804,6 km).
description.german: Fahre 804,6 km (500 Meilen).
description.french: Conduisez 804,6 km (500 miles).
description.italian: Guida per 804,6 km (500 miglia)
description.spanish: Conduce 804,6 km (500 millas).
description.dutch: Rij voor 804.6 km (500 mijl).
description.brazilian: Dirija 804,60 Km (500 milhas).

description.english: Take out each opponent at least once in a single race.
description.german: Schalte in einem einzigen Rennen jeden Gegner mindestens einmal aus.
description.french: Éliminez tous les adversaires au moins une fois dans une course unique.
description.italian: Elimina ogni avversario almeno una volta in una singola corsa.
description.spanish: Elimina a cada oponente al menos una vez en una única carrera.
description.russian: Вынести каждого соперника в гонке хотя бы один раз
description.polish: Wyprzedź każdego przeciwnika co najmniej raz w pojedynczym wyścigu.
description.dutch: Haal elke tegenstander minimaal één keer neer in een race.
description.brazilian: Vença cada adversário pelo menos uma vez.

description.english: Be featured on social media.
description.german: Werde in den Sozialen Medien ausgezeichnet.
description.french: Soyez mentionné sur les réseaux sociaux.
description.italian: Ricevi una menzione sui social di Super Street.
description.spanish: Aparece en las redes sociales.
description.dutch: Word genoemd op social media.
description.brazilian: Apareça nas redes sociais.

description.english: Be featured on the Super Street social media.
description.german: Werde in den Sozialen Medien von Super Street ausgezeichnet.
description.french: Soyez sur le réseau social Super Street.
description.italian: Ricevi una menzione sui social di Super Street.
description.spanish: Aparece en las redes sociales de Super Street.
description.russian: Оказаться на странице Super Street в социальных сетях
description.polish: Post w mediach społecznościowych Super Street.
description.dutch: Word genoemd op de Super Street social media.
description.brazilian: Apareça nas redes sociais de Super Street.

description.english: Be featured in the Super Street magazine.
description.german: Werde im Magazin von Super Street ausgezeichnet.
description.french: Soyez mentionné dans le magazine Super Street.
description.italian: Ricevi una menzione sulla rivista di Super Street.
description.spanish: Aparece en la revista de Super Street.
description.russian: Быть упомянутым в журнале Super Street
description.polish: Znajdź się w magazynie Super Street.
description.dutch: Word genoemd in het Super Street tijdschrift.
description.brazilian: Apareça na revista Super Street.

description.english: Be featured on the Super Street social media for a second time.
description.german: Werde ein zweites Mal in den Sozialen Medien von Super Street ausgezeichnet.
description.french: Soyez mentionné sur le réseau social Super Street pour la deuxième fois.
description.italian: Ricevi una seconda menzione sui social di Super Street.
description.spanish: Aparece en las redes sociales de Super Street por segunda vez.
description.russian: Оказаться на странице Super Street в социальных сетях во второй раз
description.polish: Znajdź się w mediach społecznościowych Super Street po raz drugi.
description.dutch: Word voor een tweede keer op de Super Street social media genoemd.
description.brazilian: Apareça nas redes sociais de Super Street pela segunda vez.

description.english: Buy 50 car parts to customize your car.
description.german: Kaufe 50 Autoteile, um dein Auto zu personalisieren.
description.french: Achetez 50 pièces automobiles pour personnaliser votre voiture.
description.italian: Acquista 50 ricambi per personalizzare la tua auto.
description.spanish: Compra 50 piezas de vehículo para personalizar tu vehículo.
description.dutch: Koop 50 onderdelen om je auto aan te passen.
description.brazilian: Compre 50 peças para personalizar seu carro.

description.english: Earn a gold medal in all sponsored races.
description.german: Verdiene in allen Sponsorenrennen eine Goldmedaille.
description.french: Gagnez une médaille d'or dans toutes les courses sponsorisées.
description.italian: Conquista una medaglia d'oro in tutte le corse sponsorizzate.
description.spanish: Gana una medalla de oro en todas las carreras patrocinadas.
description.russian: Получить золотые медали во всех спонсорских гонках
description.polish: Zdobądź złoty medal we wszystkich sponsorowanych wyścigach.
description.dutch: Behaal een gouden medaille in alle gesponsorde races.
description.brazilian: Receba uma medalha de ouro em todas as corridas patrocinadas.

description.english: Race your way to Super Street fame.
description.german: Rase zu Super-Street-Ruhm.
description.french: Faites la course pour devenir célèbre dans Super Street.
description.italian: Entra nell'Olimpo di Super Street
description.spanish: Ábrete camino hacia la fama en Super Street.
description.russian: Доберитесь до Олимпа славы в Super Street
description.polish: Ścigaj się, aby zdobyć sławę w Super Street.
description.dutch: Race naar Super Street roem.
description.brazilian: Conquiste a fama em Super Street.

description.english: Unlock all crewmembers.
description.german: Schalte alle Crewmitglieder frei.
description.french: Débloquez tous les membres de l'équipe.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le compagne di squadra.
description.spanish: Desbloquea a todos los miembros del equipo.
description.dutch: Speel alle crew leden vrij.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os membros da equipe.

displayName.german: Hol dir Gold oder geh nach Hause
displayName.spanish: Gana el oro o no ganes nada
displayName.dutch: Ga Voor Goud Of Ga Naar Huis

description.english: Earn a gold medal in all career races.
description.german: Verdiene in allen Karriererennen eine Goldmedaille.
description.french: Gagnez une médaille d'or dans toutes les courses de la carrière.
description.italian: Conquista una medaglia d'oro in tutte le corse carriera.
description.spanish: Gana una medalla de oro en todas las carreras.
description.russian: Получить золотую медаль во всех карьерных гонках
description.polish: Zdobądź złoty medal we wszystkich wyścigach w ramach kariery.
description.dutch: Behaal een gouden medaille voor alle carrière races.
description.brazilian: Receba uma medalha de ouro em todas as corridas de carreira.

description.english: Cross the finish line during a crash sequence.
description.german: Überquere die Ziellinie während einer Crash-Sequenz.
description.french: Passez la ligne d'arrivée pendant un accident.
description.italian: Supera il traguardo durante una sequenza di scontro.
description.spanish: Cruza la línea de meta durante una secuencia de colisiones.
description.russian: Пересечь финишную линию во время столкновения
description.dutch: Overschrijd de finishlijn tijdens een crash.
description.brazilian: Cruze a linha de chegada durante uma sequência de colisões.

description.english: At the end of a multiplayer game of 4 players, have the majority of players vote to play again.
description.german: Nach einem Multiplayer-Spiel mit 4 Spielern, stimmt die Mehrheit für eine Wiederholung.
description.french: Dans un lobby multijoueur de 4 joueurs, la majorité des joueurs vote pour rejouer.
description.italian: Dopo una partita multiplayer con 4 giocatori, la maggioranza vota per una ripetizione.
description.spanish: Después de un juego multijugador con 4 jugadores, la mayoría vota para repetir.
description.russian: Добиться переигровки в полном онлайн лобби из 4 игроков
description.polish: W lobby z 4 graczami większość głosuje za ponowną rozgrywką.
description.dutch: Laat de meerderheid van de spelers stemmen om opnieuw te spelen.
description.brazilian: Em uma sala com 6 jogadores, conseguiu que a maioria dos jogadores vote para jogar novamente.

displayName.german: Nichts weniger als der Beste, ERSTER!

description.english: Finish first in an online race.
description.german: Belege den ersten Platz in einem Online-Rennen.
description.french: Terminez premier lors d'une course en ligne.
description.italian: Arriva primo in una gara online.
description.spanish: Queda primero en una carrera en línea.
description.dutch: Behaal de eerste plek in een online race.
description.brazilian: Termine em primeiro em uma corrida online.

description.english: Reach a speed of 186 mp/h (300 km/h).
description.german: Erreiche eine Geschwindigkeit von 300 km/h (186 mp/h).
description.french: Atteignez une vitesse de 300 km/h (186 mph).
description.italian: Raggiungi una velocità di 300 km/h (186 mi/h)
description.spanish: Alcanzaste una velocidad de 300 km/h (186 mp/h).
description.dutch: Behaal een snelheid van 300 km/h (186 mp/h).
description.brazilian: Alcance velocidade de 403 km/h (250 mp/h).

description.english: Complete your first online race.
description.german: Absolviere dein erstes Online-Rennen.
description.french: Terminez votre première course en ligne.
description.italian: Completa la tua prima gara online.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera carrera en línea.
description.dutch: Voltooi je eerste online race.
description.brazilian: Complete sua primeira corrida online.

description.english: Win a circuit race without taking any damage.
description.german: Gewinne ein Rundstreckenrennen ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Gagnez une course de circuit sans subir de dégât.
description.italian: Vinci una gara circuito senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Gana una carrera de circuito sin sufrir ningún daño.
description.polish: Wygraj wyścig na torze bez uszkodzeń samochodu.
description.dutch: Win in een circuit race zonder schade op te lopen.
description.brazilian: Vença um circuito sem receber danos.
